remarks: Define the currying of ` F ` , which splits a function of two arguments into a function of the first argument, producing a function over the second argument.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.)
statement:
df-cur $p |- curry F = ( x e. dom dom F |-> { <. y , z >. | <. x , y >. F z } ) $.
$d F x y z $.
